title: Masala
description: A base I use for Chana Masala and Chicken Masala.
directions: Puree or finely chop the onion, tomatoes, garlic, and ginger.
Pour mixture into a hot pan with oil.
Stir constantly on high heat until it becomes a dark thick paste.
Add the spices and mix well.
Either add chick peas with extra water, or add chicken and cook on low heat.
